devdoc.details: Can integrate with DEX prices, external oracles, or manual price feeds

OwnableInvalidOwner(address).details: The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)

OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address).details: The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation.

returns.marketCap: Current market cap in USD (18 decimals)

returns._0: bool True if price is valid

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._updater: Address to set trust status for

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params._marketCap: New market cap in USD (18 decimals)

devdoc.title: TTrustPriceOracle

invalidatePrice().notice: Emergency function to invalidate current price

isPriceValid().notice: Check if current price is valid (not stale)

setDEXAddresses(address,address).notice: Set DEX router and pair addresses for price fetching

updatePrice(uint256,uint256).notice: Update TTrust price manually (for trusted updaters)

userdoc.notice: Oracle contract to get TTrust price data from multiple sources
